title: Cats
body: Did you know that cats are an ecological disaster! These invasive predators live in the artificial shelters of humans roam the wildness killing large numbers of birds and rodents. This has caused the extinction of over 33 different birds. They are also one of the few animals the kill for fun, freaking metal man. This has caused many birds to refer to them as "The Heartless Fur" or in bird "Soosoososososo".

title: Pain
body: Did you know the Schmidt sting pain index is a scale created by an insane man who went around getting stung by various different insects in order to map their relative pain. He describes the honey bee which scores a 2,0+ as being "Like a burning match head that lands on your skin. " And a Bullet ant at 4.0+ as being "Like walking on hot charcoals with 3 inch rusty nail in your heal"...Jesus. #patfacts.
